name: Lemon Pickle
history: Lemon Pickle, known as 'Nimbu ka Achar' in India, has been a traditional accompaniment in Indian meals for centuries. It's made by preserving lemons in spices and oil, and it's known for its tangy and often spicy flavor.
description: Lemon Pickle is a tangy and spicy condiment made from lemons preserved in a mixture of oil, salt, spices like turmeric, red chili powder, and asafoetida. This pickle is a staple in Indian cuisine and is cherished for its ability to enhance the flavor of meals.

equipment.name: jar
equipment.description: For storing and fermenting the pickle.

instructions.title: Prepare the Lemons
instructions.description: Wash the lemons thoroughly. Cut them into quarters or smaller pieces, removing any seeds.

instructions.title: Mix with Spices
instructions.description: In a large bowl, mix the lemon pieces with salt, turmeric powder, red chili powder, asafoetida, ground mustard seeds, and ground fenugreek seeds.

instructions.title: Store in a Jar
instructions.description: Transfer the lemon mixture to a clean, dry jar. Pour mustard oil over the lemons until they are completely submerged.

instructions.title: Ferment the Pickle
instructions.description: Seal the jar and keep it in a warm place. Allow the pickle to ferment for about 30 days, shaking the jar every few days to mix the contents.

instructions.title: Ready to Serve
instructions.description: Once the lemons are tender and the flavors have blended, the pickle is ready to be served.

tips: Ensure the jar is sterilized before use to prevent any bacterial growth.
The pickle's taste will develop and improve over time.
variations: Add different spices like nigella seeds or cloves for a unique flavor.
Adjust the level of spiciness by altering the amount of red chili powder.

storage.shelfLife: Can be stored for up to 1 year if kept in a cool, dry place.
storage.instructions: Ensure the lemons are always submerged in oil and the jar is sealed tightly.

presentationTips: Serve in a small traditional Indian pickle jar.
Accompany with Indian meals for an authentic experience.
